project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs basic data analysis by calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns in a CSV file specified by the user.

task.name: Implement feature to load CSV file and read its contents
Implement feature to identify numerical columns based on user input
Implement feature to calculate the mean for specified numerical columns
Implement feature to calculate the median for specified numerical columns
Implement feature to calculate the mode for specified numerical columns
Write tests for each of the features above to ensure correctness
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
